Name: Epiphany
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Not sure what a fruity bourbon drink has to do with the manifestation of Christ.
History: Created in 2004 by Naomi Young at Match, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Epiphany contains 196 calories
